definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: look (or expression?);—cstr. [[הַכָּרַת פְּנֵיהֶם]] Is 3:9 a look at their face witnesses against them (Vulgate Che:Comm. al.), or the expression of their face (Ges:Comm. De Gu SS, cf. Kit-Di), > their regarding of persons SyrVer Targum Thes Hi Du Che:Hpt (v. against this Kit-Di); Ew Di the impudence of their face (√ [[הכר]]), but this very dub.
